channel.title: machine learning on Geert Litjens
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Geert Litjens

item.title: Getting Started With Camelyon (Part 1)
item.description: This is the first part of a three part tutorial on how to get started with the CAMELYON dataset. This first part will focus on getting a basic convolutional neural network trained using PatchCAMELYON, TensorFlow 2.0, Keras and TensorFlow Datasets. Part 2 will cover applying your trained model to a whole-slide image and visualizing the results and Part 3 will cover how to use the full dataset to train a model at different resolution levels, sampling strategies, and data augmentation.
